name: Versify
tagline: Awesome realtime read-along for HTML5 Audio
body: ### Welcome Versify highlights text that's currently being spoken. $("#target").versify(); Markup your transcript with `start` and `end` attributes and a `verse` class: To be or not to be-that is the question: Add some css for the ".voice-active" selector: .voice-active { background-color: lightyellow; transition: background-color 0.2s } Alternatively, do what you like and pass an `options` object to `versify`: To be or not to be-that is the question: Whether 'tis nobler in the mind to suffer The slings and arrows of outrageous fortune, Or to take arms against a sea of troubles, ### Examples Examples available on [CodePen](http://codepen.io/sammoorhouse/pen/JRQoxe/) ### Authors and Contributors By @sammoorhouse. Contributions very welcome under MIT license. ### Support or Contact Questions? Comments? @sammoorhouse.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
